feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: I thought you were asleep,' sobbed Beth.

feels.name: Despair
feels.quote: No; it's a new one; but I can bear it,' and Beth tried to check her tears.

feels.name: Restlessness
feels.quote: I feel restless, and anxious to be seeing, doing, and learning more than I am.

feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: I'm afraid--Laurie is getting too fond of me.

Places.name: Bedroom
Places.description: Beth's bedroom where she confides in Jo about her pain.

Places.name: Living_room
Places.description: The room where Jo discusses her desire for change and anxiety about Laurie.
